anagraphic.bio:
I received my Bachelor Degree in "Ingegneria Informatica" (Computer Engineering) from the University of Pisa, Italy, in September 2020 with the score of "110/110 cum laude" (Full marks with honors, maximum graduation mark in the Italian system). I'm currently a Master Degree student in "Artificial Intelligence and Data Engineering".

I always loved solving problems and writing code. My current goal is to be able to make a profession out of a passion.

projects.title: PacMan
projects.description: A version of the Pacman game written using Java8 and the JavaFX 2.2 API

projects.title: Hardware-ECommerce-Website
projects.description:
University project website for the exam "Progettazione Web" created using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, PHP & AJAX.

The website is completeley in Italian

projects.title: UniMusic
projects.description: Project for the 'Large-Scale and Multi-Structured Databases' course. Music application that uses a MongoDB and a Neo4j database

projects.title: CovidTracker
projects.description: Project for the 'Distributed Systems and Middleware Technologies' course

projects.title: FederatedDBSCAN
projects.description: Project for the 'Data Mining and Machine Learning' course

projects.title: Frogger-Game
projects.description: A Java version of Frogger game developed using javaFX

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: Repository with the source code of my Angular 7 + Boostrap 4 personal website

projects.title: SmartPool
projects.description: Project for the 'Internet of Things' course

projects.title: PageRank
projects.description: Project for the 'Cloud Computing' course. Implementation of the Page Rank algorithm using Hadoop and Spark frameworks

projects.title: MusicClassifier
projects.description: This project aims to generate highly accurate and reproducible machine learning models that can predict a song's genre based on its audio features.

technologicalSkills.text: I have worked with a wide variety of programming languages and love learning how to use new tools. My interest mainly revolves around AI, but I continually try to expand my wealth of knowledge related to other areas, focusing mainly on the most cutting-edge technologies
